articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative Refers to Necessity of Dismantlement of "UN Command"
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative Refers to Necessity of Dismantlement of "UN Command"
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK permanent representative at the UN Office and other international organizations in Geneva was interviewed by reporters at the DPRK permanent mission on Wednesday.
					 Present there were reporters of China, UK, France, U.S., Japan and other countries and relevant officials.
					
					 The permanent representative said that to dismantle the illegal and ghost-like "UN Command" is a prerequisite to defusing tensions and ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Explaining why the DPRK is again underlining the need to dismantle the "UN Command", he said:
					
					 First, it is because the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula is increasing for the reason related to the structure of the "UN Command".
					
					 Looking back and analyzing the situation that prevailed on the peninsula in March and April, we reached at an important conclusion that the Command is a major factor creating the danger of war.
					
					 If the U.S. stages joint military exercises in August, the Korean Peninsula will again plunge into an unpredictable catastrophic phase.
					
					 The DPRK once again strongly calls for the dismantlement of the "UN Command" with July 27, the 60th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement, as a momentum.
					
					 Second, it is because the "UN Command" is inciting military confrontation among big powers in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea, the main forces of the "UN Command", have already been granted "strategic flexibility" which enables them to intervene in other regions in the event of crisis, and the U.S. is attempting to turn the "UN Command" into a multi-national coalition body with operational function in order to keep hold on south Korea militarily even after the transfer of the right to command the wartime operation.
					
					 Those concerned with the operations of member states of the "UN Command" have already been well versed in combined operations under the U.S. command through joint military exercises.
					
					 Third, it is because the dismantlement of the "UN Command" is an action step which can prove that the U.S. has no hostility toward the DPRK as always claimed by it.
					
					 The dismantlement of the "UN Command" is an issue which can be easily settled if the U.S. has determination.
					
					 To look back on the past, resolution No. 84 which was illegally adopted at the UN Security Council on July 7, 1950 says the "Combined Forces Command", not the "UN Command", shall be formed, and entrusted the U.S. with the right to command the "Combined Forces Command".
					
					 If the U.S. makes a bold decision on dismantling the "UN Command", the DPRK will respond to this and this will help build confidence between the two countries.
					
					 The DPRK will closely follow the future action of the U.S.
					
					 The permanent representative stressed that if the UN member nations truly want peace on the Korean Peninsula and are to keep the authority and fairness of the UN, they should express due support to the DPRK's efforts to dismantle the "UN Command" and establish peace mechanism.

articles.title: Greetings to Speaker of People's Consultative Assembly of Indonesia
articles.content:
Greetings to Speaker of People's Consultative Assembly of Indonesia
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday sent a congratulatory message to Sidarto Danusubroto upon his appointment as speaker of the People's Consultative Assembly of Indonesia.
					 The message wished the speaker success in his work, expressing belief that the relations between the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the People's Consultative Assembly of Indonesia would develop on good terms in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Montenegro
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Montenegro
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Saturday sent a message of greeting to Filip Vujanovic, president of Montenegro, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the president of Montenegro success in his responsible work for socio-economic development of the country and the people of Montenegro progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Unfolds Grand Blueprint for Postwar Rehabilitation and Construction during Fatherland Liberation War
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Unfolds Grand Blueprint for Postwar Rehabilitation and Construction during Fatherland Liberation War
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung looked far into the future of the country which won a victory in the grim period of the Fatherland Liberation War, firmly believing in the strength of the army and people, and unfolded a bright blueprint for the postwar rehabilitation and construction.
					 At the Third Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in December, Juche 39 (1950), the President set forth the task for making preparations for the postwar rehabilitation and construction while pushing forward the wartime production.
					
					 In January, 1951 he taught officials in the field of city design to work out a general blueprint for rehabilitation and construction of Pyongyang after the war and build it to be modern and cultural, not just restoring it to its original state.
					
					 At a Congress of Scientists in April, 1952 he made speech "For the Development of Sciences in Our Country" and at a Meeting of the Political Committee of the WPK Central Committee in June, 1953 a concluding speech "On the Orientation for Postwar Economic Reconstruction", indicating the basic orientation of rehabilitation and construction of the national economy.
					
					 He also made speech "The Prospects of the Fatherland Liberation War and the Tasks of the University" before the faculty and students of Kim Il Sung University in April, 1952 in which he indicated the tasks for surveying and bringing under control the natural resources of the country and carrying out the study for their rational use for the postwar rehabilitation and construction.
					
					 In speech made at a conference of the DPRK Cabinet in September the same year "On Carrying Out the Reclamation of Northern Plateaus" he reviewed the achievements made by members of a survey group and indicated the orientation and ways for building an agro-stock farm in the northern plateaus.
					
					 He made sure that a revolutionary measure was taken to summon many combatants on the front to universities and colleges for the training of national cadres essential for the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction.
					
					 He saw to it that big machine production bases are built in Huichon and different other parts of the country and sent technicians as well as equipment, materials and funds needed for the construction and operation. He also instructed officials to create forest resources and conduct the work of seeding-selection well.
					
					 He also taught to send survey groups made up of university teachers, students and technicians to different parts of the country so that they can make researches for the effective use of natural resources of the country. He, at the same time, pushed forward the preparations for the socialist transformation of production relations after the war.
					
					 Under his wise guidance the preparations for the postwar rehabilitation and construction made rapid progress.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Disturber of Peace and Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Disturber of Peace and Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- U.S. Congress recently tabled a "resolution" on "praying for peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula" with the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement as a momentum. The "resolution" says "nuclear weapons of north Korea are the biggest hurdle" lying in the way of the peace and reunification of the peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 This is an unpardonable insult to the Korean nation which has longed for reunification for decades and sophism to evade the blame for the division of the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is describing nuclear weapons of the DPRK as hurdles lying in the way of peace and reunification of the peninsula which, when seen from the reversed way, means that Pyongyang's nuclear weapons are the biggest hurdles lying in the way of realizing its criminal scenario for igniting a war against the DPRK anytime by keeping hold on south Korea for an indefinite period.
					
					 Peace has been maintained in the Korean Peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region because the DPRK has the great Songun politics and strong physical deterrent no enemy dares provoke.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly interested in peace and reunification of the peninsula, it should make a bold decision to withdraw its forces from south Korea, the forces which are the biggest hurdles, to begin with.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Validity of WPK's Policy for Building Highly Civilized Socialist Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Validity of WPK's Policy for Building Highly Civilized Socialist Nation 
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address set forth the tasks for spurring the building of a highly civilized socialist nation to usher in the new era of cultural efflorescence in the 21st century.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says this idea is the most just one based on the requirement of on-going development in the 21st century and on the profound and comprehensive analysis of a thriving socialist nation of Juche.
					
					 The course in which people achieve cultural efflorescence in mental and material aspects as those responsible for the revolution and construction is making rapid progress in the present times, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 In order to reach the high level of civilization in the new century, it is necessary to channel big efforts into the work for bringing up people to be more civilized ones and make the environment of production and life of society more hygienic and cultural, beautiful and modern.
					
					 The cause of building a thriving socialist nation of Juche can be realized with success only when high criterion are met not only in terms of politics, ideology, military affairs and economy but in civilization.
					
					 The idea of building a civilized socialist nation is valid in that it clearly indicates the practical ways of building a highly civilized nation and helps give full play to its vitality.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Condemned by Students
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Condemned by Students
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The General Student Council of  Seoul National University of south Korea held a rally outside the building of the "Saenuri Party" in Youido, Seoul on Friday denouncing the party for trying to gloss over the puppet Intelligence Service's interference in the election.
					 At the rally speakers said the "Saenuri Party" is blustering that former president Roh Moo Hyun intended to offer the northern limit  line to the north, farm from apologizing for the IS's interference in the election and advancing ways for preventing the recurrence. The party resort to this trite method with the use of a "theory of coloring" whenever they are caught in political crisis to tide over the situation, they charged.
					
					 It is becoming clearer day by day that the "Saenuri Party" deceived the people in league with the IS, they held.
					
					 Recalling the recent suggestion made by the "Saenuri Party" of forming a special committee within the party for the purpose of reforming the IS, they urged the party not to deceive the people again under the pretext of the reform.
					
					 All this proves that the present regime has no will to punish those involved in the IS's case and settle the issue, they said.
					
					 It is clear that if those concerned are not thoroughly punished, the IS will as ever conduct illegal watch and surveillance and unhesitatingly interfere in such important affairs as election, they deplored.
					
					 Prior to the rally, the General Student Council published a declaration in the name of 1 333 students, postgraduates and graduates.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Censured for Blocking Candlelight Action of Students
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Censured for Blocking Candlelight Action of Students
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Students of south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet Police Agency building on Friday denouncing the police for its fascist suppression of the candlelight action which condemned the puppet Intelligence Service's racket.
					 At the conference speakers recalled that the police on Wednesday summoned 28 students who took part in the candlelight rally to appear at the police.
					
					 This is aimed to calm down people's demand for a thorough-going investigation into the IS's interference in the election and arrest students from participating in candlelight action, they charged.
					
					 They condemned the police for cracking down on students, far from investigating the IS as regards its interference in the election.
					
					 Students will not respond to the police investigation but react to it with stronger candlelight actions, they stressed.

articles.title: Crimes by Teenagers Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crimes by Teenagers Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Crimes by teenagers are on the steady increase in south Korea, according to CBS of south Korea on Thursday.
					 The number of robbery, rape, arson and other crimes committed by teenagers was almost doubled from that of five years ago.
					
					 The method of crimes is becoming all the more cruel.
					
					 Also increasing is the number of youngsters committing other crimes to add to what they did before.
					
					 The number of ex-convicts with more than nine times of indictment reached about 3 300 last year from around 900 in 2008.
					
					 Reporting on this, the broadcasting said society connives at the crimes by teenagers considering them as ordinary misdeed, causing the increase in number and deterioration in method.

articles.title: Earthquake Occurs in West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Occurs in West Sea of Korea
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- There was an earthquake measuring 3.5 on the Richter scale in waters around Ochong Island in the West Sea of Korea on Saturday, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Slight tremors were said to have felt in some areas of North Jolla Province.
					
					 Quakes measuring around 3 on the Richter scale are reported in succession in the same waters from June.

articles.title: Book "Socialism and 21st Century" Off Press in Ukraine
articles.content:
Book "Socialism and 21st Century" Off Press in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- An institute of socialist affairs in Ukraine recently published book "Socialism and 21st Century".
					 The book deals with revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the DPRK, is possessed of distinguished leadership personality, it says, adding he is revered as one of the prominent men in the world.
					
					 It praises the DPRK for registering epochal achievements in various sectors of social life, while regarding the immortal Juche idea as the guidelines.
					
					 It says that the DPRK manufactured and launched satellite, a complex of scientific and technological development that showcases the economic potentials of the state with its own efforts and by indigenous technology, adding it is successfully building entertainment and resting places for the people in every part of the country.
					
					 It scathingly denounces the U.S. imperialists and the puppet south Korean regime for their vicious moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The book was written by academic figures of Ukraine and Russia.

articles.title: Remembrance Meetings Held Abroad
articles.content:
Remembrance Meetings Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Russia, Britain and Italy on July 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, and other speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the distinguished leader of the world socialist movement.
					
					 They said it is the unanimous will of not only the Korean people but also the revolutionaries of the world to eternally hold him in high esteem as the leader of the revolution.
					
					 Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, lauded Kim Il Sung as the founder of socialist Korea, who founded the Juche idea and pursued the independent politics, and outstanding strategist and invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated two powerful imperialist enemies in one generation.
					
					 He noted that Kim Il Sung was a prominent leader who made immortal contribution to the global independence with the great idea and leadership ability with no one to match for on earth.
					
					 Matteo Carbonelli, secretary general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Il Sung was a greatest man as he was possessed of humble, artless and kind-hearted traits.
					
					 He added that Kim Il Sung always lives in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind just as the sun is eternal.
					
					 A message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in Russia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Colorful events took place in different countries from July 3 and 8 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included round-table talks, lectures, seminars, film shows and photo exhibitions in Cuba, Myanmar, India and Ethiopia.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos of Kim Il Sung on his revolutionary career and exploits and works of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "Eternal Treasure in Praise of the Sun".
					
					 Aye Myint, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korean people is recorded with pride and merits as they have frustrated all sorts of moves on the part of the hostile forces and hastened the dynamic march for building a rich and powerful country by dint of unity between the whole Party and all people under the wise leadership of the great leaders.
					
					 Balzor Singh Chauhan, chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, noted that Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, has been revered as the eternal sun of Juche from progressive humankind.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung provided a great guiding idea for accomplishing the human cause of independence by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 He set forth independence as fundamental principle of relations among countries and regarded it as his iron rule to exercise full equality and sovereignty in the external activities.
					
					 Kim Il Sung who opened up the independent era and dedicated his life to the victorious advance of the human cause of independence will always live in the hearts of the peoples the world over.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and personages of Mexico and UK visited DPRK embassies in their countries on July 8, the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were the People's Socialist Party of Mexico,  Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Mexican Friend Association for Memory of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, chairman and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), spokesman (leader) and general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain and the chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and full-length paintings of Kim Il Sung standing with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said that Kim Il Sung was the distinguished thinker and theoretician who founded the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea centered on the popular masses, for the first time in history. The Juche idea will shed its rays as eternal guidelines of the world revolution, he added.
					
					 The spokesman (leader) of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) noted that Kim Il Sung dedicated himself to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence. He will always be with progressive mankind, he added.
					
					 The Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, Socialist Party of Mexico, Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, Mexico-Korea Friendship Association and the national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations posted special write-ups on their websites on July 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article titled "Accomplishment of Korean revolution with one's own efforts" illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The article dealt in detail with the fact that he rejected flunkeyism and dogmatism and thoroughly establish Juche in the whole period of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal President of DPRK":
					
					 The Korean people are holding him in high esteem as eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 He is the founder of socialist Korea which is demonstrating its might as a political, ideological and military power in the world.
					
					 He defined independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence as the fundamental principles of building the independent and sovereign state to which he constantly adhered in the whole period of leading the DPRK.
					
					 Socialist system centered on the popular masses in which the people have become the master of everything and everything serves them has been built in Korea thanks to him.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article introducing the undying feats he performed for the revolutionary cause of Juche and the human cause of independence, illustrated with his portrait.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups in the period between June 30 and July 4 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Guinean paper Horoya dedicated one whole page to an article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 Though many years have passed since Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, passed away, he is being revered as the eternal sun of Juche by progressive mankind, it said, introducing in detail his undying feats.
					
					 The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional carried an article titled "Idea and feats of President Kim Il Sung" illustrated with his portrait.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, holding high the banner of independence" accompanied with his photo.
					
					 Though he, the founder of socialist Korea, passed away, reverence for him has grown deeper, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 He sincerely helped other countries in their cause for independence against imperialism.
					
					 His energetic and disinterested support and encouragement are deeply recorded in the history of the struggle of the people of different countries in the world against colonialism, racism and imperialist aggression.
					
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer carried an article saying that his august name is shining in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On a Historic Victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the Tasks of the People's Army" was brought out in booklet by a German publishing house.
					 The work, published on Oct. 23, Juche 42 (1953), clarifies the significance of historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and its factor, tasks for the people's army in the post-war period and so on.
					
					 The releasing ceremony of the work took place in Berlin on July 9.
					
					 The preface of the booklet reads "special publication on the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Korean war. July 27, 1953 is a meaningful day when the Korean people won a historic victory in the war with the U.S. that boasted of being the 'strongest' in the world".
					
					 The director of the publishing house said:
					
					 It is the greatest honor of our publishing house to publish the immortal work of the President.
					
					 This work will help the westerners to have the right understanding of the Korean war.
					
					 The Korean people turned the country into a power from scratch.
					
					 I hope the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will achieve further success in their effort for the national prosperity and happiness of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of German Organization
Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- "1. Foundation of the Juche Idea" of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was posted on the website of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on July 8.
					 The work, published on Mar. 31, Juche 71 (1982), defines the historic feats President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea. It also expounds the philosophical principle, socio-historical principles, guiding principles of the Juche idea and its historical significance.
